task: Find a French ratatouille recipe on Allrecipes with a 4-star rating or higher and at least 15 reviews. Note the variety of vegetables included and the overall cooking time.
Find a French ratatouille recipe on Allrecipes with a 4-star rating or higher and at least 15 reviews. Note the variety of vegetables included and the overall cooking time.
user_action_and_explanation: type "French ratatouille" in the search bar with the placeholder text 'Find a recipe or ingredient'. This action will help locate specific recipes related to French ratatouille on Allrecipes.
observation: The search for 'French ratatouille' returned several recipes. Many have ratings of 4 stars or higher and more than 15 reviews. For example, 'Ratatouille' has 1,120 ratings, 'Disney's Ratatouille' has 476 ratings, and 'Ratatouille Bake' has 530 ratings. All of these have a 4-star or higher rating. The ingredients showcase a variety of vegetables that align with the traditional ratatouille. The overall cooking time is 1 hour, as previously noted, with a prep time of 15 minutes and a cook time of 45 minutes.
